name: IEEE--2018 the Optoelectronics Global Conference (OGC 2018)--Ei Compendex & SCOPUS
content: ◆Publication: All accepted papers will be published in conference Proceedings by Conference Publishing Services, and reviewed by the IEEE Conference Publication Program for IEEE Xplore and Ei Compendex & SCOPUS. ◆Submission Methods: Easy Chair System: http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=ogc2018
